intro: Hi, This is Jason! an Enterprise Architect and he can help you putting up a technology roadmap for your organization?. You can get started by typing the menu options!!

images.intro: Hi, This is Jason! a Life Coach and he can help you putting up a roadmap for a healthy work-life balance?. You can get started by typing the menu options!!
images.title: Life Coach
images.description:
Menu Options:
 '101' to get an intro of Jason.
 '102' to learn and understand what Enterprise Architects do.
 '103' to view anyupcoming or past trainings conducted.
 '104' to deploy Jason at your Organization.

Good Luck and Have a wonderful time.
